scripts.dev: shx cp ./backend/config/categories.json ./public/categories.json && shx cp ./backend/config/news_sources.json ./public/news_sources.json && next dev
scripts.build: shx cp ./backend/config/categories.json ./public/categories.json && shx cp ./backend/config/news_sources.json ./public/news_sources.json && next build
scripts.start: shx cp ./backend/config/categories.json ./public/categories.json && shx cp ./backend/config/news_sources.json ./public/news_sources.json && next start
